lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Still, NASDA is free from private competition at home and has the full support of the government, since aerospace was chosen by the Ministry of Trade and Information as one of the country's new industries for the next decade.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The administration's decision left Arianespace, a French-led European consortium, the only option available to satellite owners and the concern quickly sold out all its planned flights through 1989.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. firms, including McDonnell Douglas Corp, General Dynamics Corp and Martin Marietta promised to spend mlns of dollars over the next three years to develop their own satellite launch capabilities.
